ygData.subject: Re: will-o-wisp
ygData.msgSnippet: it might be dependent on your location... i.e. the willowisps near the wood elves change faction standing... but others don t (example the surefall bears vs
ygData.messageBody:
it might be dependent on your location... i.e. the willowisps near the wood
elves change faction standing... but others don't (example the surefall
bears vs the bears just out side in the qey hills)
----- Original Message -----
From: Shadowwalker <Shadowwalker@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 10:49 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: will-o-wisp


> From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>
>
> I spend an evening killing will-i-wisps with a friend once and never once
> did we get a faction adjustment message.
>
> -Shadowwalker of Karana
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 9:54 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: will-o-wisp
>
>
> > From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>
> >
> > Wood Elves think the willowisps are souls, and they become reborn into
> > willowisps. So your faction to to wood elves get worse when you kill
them.
> >
> > (its a rumor)
> > Can anyone confirm/disconfirm it?
> >
>
>
>
>
>
